ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
// è®¾å¤‡ç±»å‹åˆ¤æ–­
function deviceType() {
  try {
    return !!java.androidId();
  } catch (e) {
    return false;
  }
}

let device = deviceType() ? 'android' : 'ios';

if (device === 'android') {
  var typeMap = {audio:32, comic:64};
  book.type = /tab=(audio|comic)/.test(baseUrl) ? typeMap[RegExp.$1] : 8;
} else {
  var typeMap = {audio:1, comic:2, video:3};
  book.type = /tab=(audio|comic|video)/.test(baseUrl) ? typeMap[RegExp.$1] : 0;
}
result;
</js>
